Appointment Scheduling and Workflow Management Tool

Abstract

Moorfields Eye Hospital uses excel spreadsheets to record patients' information and update their Appointment Schedules.
It is not particularly efficient - ocularists and admins have to navigate and modify across several different spreadsheets in order to perform simple actions such as book in appointments.
On top of that the spreadsheets provide informations in a unorganised way which can be hard for ocularists to read.
Our website is here to save them from the time consuming and chaotic scheduling processes.
We provide excellent user interface that shows informations in a intuitive way as well as a significantly faster and easier booking process. Ocularists can view their schedules in their personal timetable at rota page with clickable expanding windows showing all relative informations. The timetable also shows available slots and add appointment options so that ocularist can book in appointment easily.

Features

Appointment booking

Tired of having to waste so much time for booking just one appointment? Our schedule webapp helps you to do the job! You can view your available slots at your personal timetable and click to add new appointments. Simply fill in essential information once,your appointments are created!
You can also go to appointment page to modify existing appointments. Updated appointments will automatically show up in your personal timetable.

Multifunctional Timetable

I spend so much time allocating informations I need for my appointments! No worries, with our webapp you can view all the informations you need for your appointments at your timetable. You can click on patient's name and appointment ID to view patient's details and appointment informations repectively.

View your team's schedule

Want to know what is the day like for your colleagues? You can do that in your Team rota page! Team rota provides a good view of every members work load. Admins can also assign appointments to team member.

Update patients' details

You can update or add new patients in the waitlist page. We provide easy ways to filter patients by their priority and age! you can also search by their names.
